pages.title: Output Port
pages.text: The Output Port allow you to extract the re-processed material from the Reprocessor.$(br2)The graphical interface can be used to extract materials manually or you can connect a pipe of sort to extract them automatically.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() one, and only one, is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any vertical face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes
